text: @Jacob_Rees_Mogg Get a grip!!! How many other people in the UK with coronavirus did the same?? They didn’t coz they followed rules. Single mums on benefit with Covid who couldn’t have afforded childcare like Cummings didn’t do it. Are you saying he’s the only parent who cares for their child??
